verses.english: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
verses.hausa: Ina rantsuwa da iskõkin da ake sakõwa jẽre, sunã bin jũna.

verses.english: And the winds that blow violently
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, su zamã iskõki mãsu ƙarfi suna kaɗãwa da ƙarfi.

verses.english: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]
verses.hausa: Kuma, mãsu watsa rahama wãtsãwa.

verses.english: And those [angels] who bring criterion
verses.hausa: sa'an nan, da ãyõyi mãsu rarrabe gaskiya da ƙarya rarrabẽwa.

verses.english: And those [angels] who deliver a message
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan da malã'iku mãsu jẽfa tunãtarwa ga Manzanni.

verses.english: As justification or warning,
verses.hausa: Domin yanke hamzari ko dõmin gargadi.

verses.english: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, abin da ake yi muku wa'adi da shi tabbas mai aukuwa ne

verses.english: So when the stars are obliterated
verses.hausa: To, idan taurãri aka shãfe haskensu.

verses.english: And when the heaven is opened
verses.hausa: Kuma, idan sama aka tsãge ta.

verses.english: And when the mountains are blown away
verses.hausa: Kuma, idan duwãtsu aka nike su.

verses.english: And when the messengers' time has come...
verses.hausa: Kuma, idan manzanni aka ƙayyade lõkacin tãra su.

verses.english: For what Day was it postponed?
verses.hausa: Domin babbar rãnar da aka yi wa ajali.

verses.english: For the Day of Judgement.
verses.hausa: Domin rãnar rarrabẽwa.

verses.english: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
verses.hausa: Kuma, me ya sanar da kai rãnar rarrabẽwa?

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone yã tabbata a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
verses.hausa: Ashe, ba Mu halakar da (mãsu ƙaryatãw) na farko ba.

verses.english: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, kuma zã Mu biyar musu da na ƙarshe?

verses.english: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
verses.hausa: Haka nan, Muke aikatãwa da mãsu yin laifi.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone yã tabbata a rãnar nan ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
verses.hausa: Ashe, ba Mu halitta ku daga wani ruwa wulakantacce ba.

verses.english: And We placed it in a firm lodging
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka sanya shi a cikin wani wurin natsuwa amintacce.

verses.english: For a known extent.
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga wani gwargwadon mudda sananna.

verses.english: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, Muka nũna iyãwarMu? Madalla da Mu, Mãsu nũna iyãwa.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata a rãnar nan ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: Have We not made the earth a container
verses.hausa: Ashe, ba Mu sanya ƙasa matattarã ba.

verses.english: Of the living and the dead?
verses.hausa: Ga rãyayyu da matattu,

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا
verses.english: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
verses.hausa: Kuma, Muka sanya, a cikinta, kafaffun duwãtsu maɗaukaka, kuma Muka shayar da ku ruwa mai dãɗi?

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
verses.hausa: Ku tafi zuwa ga abin da kuka kasance kuna ƙaryatãwa game da shi!

verses.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.english: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
verses.hausa: Ku tafi zuwa ga wata inuwa mai rassa uku.

verses.arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
verses.english: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."
verses.hausa: Ita ba inuwar ba, kuma ba ta wadãtarwa daga harshen wuta.

verses.english: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, ita, tanã jifã da tartsatsi kamar sõraye.

verses.english: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.
verses.hausa: Kamar dai su raƙumma ne baƙãƙe.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: This is a Day they will not speak,
verses.hausa: Wannan, yini ne da bã zã su iya yin magana ba.

verses.english: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.
verses.hausa: Bã zã a yi musu izni ba, balle su kãwo hanzari.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
verses.hausa: Wannan rãnar rarrabẽwa ce, Mun tattara ku tare da mutãnen farko.

verses.english: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
verses.hausa: To, idan akwai wata dabara gare ku, sai ku yi ma Ni ita.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, mãsu taƙawa suna a cikin inuwõwi da marẽmari.

verses.english: And fruits from whatever they desire,
verses.hausa: Da wasu 'ya'yan itãce irin waɗanda suke marmari.

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
verses.hausa: (A ce musu) "Ku ci ku sha cikin ni'ima sabõda abin da kuka kasance kuna aikatãwa."

verses.english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũ haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.
verses.hausa: (Ana ce musu) "Ku ci ku ji ɗan dãdi kaɗan, lalle ne dai ku mãsu laifi ne."

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.english: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
verses.hausa: Kuma, idan an ce musu: "Ku yi rukũ'i; bã zã su yi rukũ'in (salla) ba."

verses.english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata, a rãnar nan, ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa!

verses.english: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?
verses.hausa: To, da wane lãbãri (Littãfi), waninsa (Alƙur'ãni) zã su yi ĩmãni
